name: Atari Planetarium
overview: The magic of microelectronics now makes it possible for you to have a planetarium-style model of the universe in your own home. All you do is push a few buttons on your ATARI XL or XE Computer and your requested view of the universe is neatly displayed in bright, easy-to-read colors on screen. The computer handles the awesome computations and enormous amounts of data. You need only sit back and tour deep space.
